ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR((ISCHANGED( ManagerId ) && ($Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login')),(ISCHANGED( Email ) && ($Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login' || $Profile.Name ='Nokia Sales Profile' || $Profile.Name ='Sales Ops Profile' )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to edit this information.
